A day for the designers and developers building the future of the web.

On Wednesday 9th April, back-to-back with JSConf AU, the historic Melbourne Arts House will be filled with international and local experts, great food and coffee, and much food for thought.

Melbourne Arts House, 1874

It’ll be a small and special event, following on from the fantastic CSSConf US and CSSConf EU events, including some special side-events allowing you to see parts of Melbourne and to make some new friends.

Tickets go on sale early 2014 and will be strictly limited.

Join the announment list below to ensure you don’t miss out. Also be sure to follow @cssconf_au. Don’t say we didn’t warn you :)

Team

The core organising group is @benschwarz, @fionachan, @xzyfer, @glenmaddern and @toolmantim. We’ve run community events all around Australia, including JSConf, RubyConf, and Rails Camp.

Sponsorship

We’re looking for fantastic companies to help make this event possible. If you think your company could help, please drop an email to sponsponsors@somewhere.com
